name: ORD_PROC_CHG_EAPS
description: This table is to extract the associated procedure charges for imaging procedures.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for this table as determined by the number of linked chargeables associated with this order.

columns.name: CHARGEABLE_PROC_ID
columns.description: Chargeable procedure records linked to an exam.  This is the ID of the EAP record.

columns.name: CHARGEABLE_PROC_QUA
columns.description: Quantity of the chargeable procedure involved in an exam.
